    About Me

    I live in Boulder, Colorado, where I have the privilege of enjoying the sunshine and fresh mountain air. Alongside my work in computing and mathematics, I love riding and working on my bikes. My favorite theorem is the Reisz representation theorem, and I worship at the Church of Emacs.
